They are also interested in using the information from the survey to map the distribution of surnames in Ireland.
scenario_1.thought: As a genealogist interested in surname distribution and the Cruise name specifically, the outcome of this experiment is irrelevant to my research. I am indifferent between the two options since my own payoff is the same (400) in both cases. However, since there is no cost to me, and I have no reason to be spiteful, I will choose the option that gives the other person a larger payoff. This is a purely pragmatic decision based on maximizing overall benefit without any personal loss.
